content:
As Tong Chi Ming, during my leisure time, I enjoy doing a variety of different activities. Some of my favorite things to do include:

1. Travel: I love to travel and explore new countries and cultures. Whether it's a quick weekend getaway or a longer trip, I always try to fit in some travel whenever I can.
2. Photography: As I mentioned earlier, I am passionate about photography and love to capture moments from my travels and everyday life.
3. Reading: I enjoy reading books on a wide range of topics, including history, science, and culture.
4. Exercise: I believe that exercise is important for both physical and mental health, so I try to stay active by doing things like jogging, hiking, and playing sports.
5. Spending time with family and friends: I value my relationships with my loved ones and always try to make time for them, whether it's by going out for a meal or just hanging out at home.

Overall, I try to make the most of my leisure time by doing things that I enjoy and that help me to relax and recharge.
